source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [JOB_SCRIPT] AS [SRC_LIST], [SOURCE_TABLE] AS [SRC_TBL], [TARGET_TABLE] AS [TGT_TBL] 
FROM [ADF].[ETL_JOB] WHERE ACTIVE_FLG ='Y' AND JOB_GROUP='PLP' AND JOB_SUB_GROUP='PLP - G00'

FROM [ADF].[ETL_JOB] WHERE ACTIVE_FLG ='Y' AND JOB_GROUP='PLP' AND JOB_SUB_GROUP='PLP - G01'
